column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I have to admit I've only eaten in the actual restaurant once
column2: I'm a delivery addict. Even if delivery Â takes a full hour or if there is a long line for a table
column3: it is ALWAYS worth the wait. My favorite is just the plain cheese. Although the Lou and the Deluxe are also good. (Hell
column4: everything is good!) I've also had salad delivered
column5: which was also yummy. Yay Lou Malnati's!
